text: "Ben" (often referred to as "Ben's Song") is a song written by Don Black and Walter Scharf, famously performed by Michael Jackson. It was released in 1972 and served as the title track for the film of the same name, which tells the story of a young boy who befriends a rat named Ben. The song is characterized by its emotional depth and tenderness, capturing the bond between the boy and the rat. "Ben" is notable for being one of Jackson's early hits as a solo artist, following his time with the Jackson 5. The song received critical acclaim and was a commercial success, reaching high positions on music charts, and it also earned an Academy Award nomination for Best Original Song. Michael Jackson's heartfelt rendition helped to solidify his status as a talented singer and artist beyond his childhood success. Category:1972 songs Category:Michael Jackson songs
